name: Edna Margen's Cool Carrots

ingredients.name: medium onion, thinly sliced and separated into large rings

instructions: Cook carrots in boiling salted water for 5 minutes or until crisp tender. Drain. Combine carrots, green pepper and onion in a 13 x 9 x 2 inch pan. Toss until mixed. Combine soup, sugar, oil, vinegar, and mustard; stir until combined. Pour soup mixture over carrot mixture, cover and marinate in refrigerator for 8 hours or overnight.
